about.name: Nive Venkat
about.tagline: Structural Engineer → NYU Stern MBA (Business Analytics, Strategy, Technology Product Management)
about.bio:
Hi! I’m Nive Venkat, and welcome to my corner of the internet.
For the past several years, I’ve worked as a Structural Engineer, designing and managing complex water infrastructure projects that keep communities running. I’ve always loved the process of solving problems — breaking them down, analyzing data, and building systems that work in the real world.
In 2023, I began my MBA at NYU Stern, specializing in Business Analytics, Strategy, and Technology Product Management. Since then, I’ve focused on how AI, analytics, and business strategy come together to shape smarter, more resilient organizations. I’ve led and contributed to projects ranging from AI-driven product design to carbon credit pricing models and digital transformation strategies for sustainability-focused companies.
That blend of engineering precision, business judgment, and tech curiosity is what drives me — whether I’m evaluating a business model, analyzing market data, or designing scalable systems for decision-making.
Becoming a mom has also shaped the way I see work and purpose. Balancing parenthood, a full-time career, and graduate school has taught me resilience, empathy, and the power of small, consistent steps toward big goals.
When I’m not building systems or studying case frameworks, you’ll usually find me baking something sweet, hiking with my family, or creating new toddler activities for my son. I also love experimenting with AI tools and side projects that make everyday life a little smarter and more joyful.
I’m excited about this next chapter — one where I can blend engineering logic, business strategy, and creative curiosity to design solutions that make a difference.
highlights: NYU Stern MBA (Business Analytics, Strategy, Tech PM)
Projects: custom GPTs, RAG tools, automations

projects.title: Email Summarizer (n8n)
projects.subtitle: Automated weekly digest of top emails with AI
projects.overview: A fully automated email summarizer built using n8n that reads the top 50 emails from a user’s inbox, categorizes key themes, extracts to-do items, and delivers a weekly summary email with highlights and actionable next steps. It connects with Gmail, uses OpenAI for intelligent summarization, and compiles the output into a clean, readable digest sent every Monday.
stack: OpenAI API for summarization and extraction
target_users: Busy professionals drowning in email clutter
Consultants and managers managing multiple clients
Students and researchers seeking weekly knowledge digests
Knowledge workers balancing communication and analysis
impact: Reduces inbox review time by up to 70%
Improves focus by surfacing only what matters

projects.title: FEMA Companion
projects.subtitle: AI knowledge assistant for seismic design (RAG)
projects.overview: A specialized AI tool to help engineers quickly interpret FEMA P-750 and NIST GCR seismic design guidelines. Users can ask natural-language questions and receive concise, cited explanations from the official design documents. Built with embeddings, vector retrieval, and a Streamlit UI.
stack: ChromaDB for vector storage and retrieval
focus: Accessibility: Converts static PDFs into a searchable knowledge base
Accuracy: Answers cite the original code sections
Efficiency: Reduces time searching manuals by 80%+
target_users: Structural engineers referencing FEMA/NIST design codes
Engineering students learning seismic design fundamentals
impact: Cuts reference lookup from hours to seconds
Encourages code compliance via cited answers
Demonstrates practical AI for engineering knowledge

projects.title: ParentPal
projects.subtitle: Custom GPT for trustworthy parenting guidance
projects.overview: A custom GPT designed to support new parents with trustworthy, evidence-based information about child health, safety, and development. The bot guides users to reliable resources from the AAP via HealthyChildren.org and answers with warmth, clarity, and verified links.
target_users: Childcare workers or educators referencing AAP guidance
impact: Delivers quick, verified links and answers
Encourages speaking with pediatricians for medical advice

projects.title: SalesSense AI
projects.subtitle: Real-time sales intelligence agent (RAG + automation)
projects.overview: An AI-powered Sales Intelligence Agent that transforms raw sales data and reports into conversational insights. An n8n automation monitors a Drive/CRM export folder for new files, ingests and embeds them into a vector database, and enables users to ask questions about revenue, targets, and growth.
stack: Data normalization for CSVs, Sheets, PDFs
GPT query engine with cited, KPI-focused answers
impact: Reduces manual report compilation time by ~80%
Delivers live insights grounded in company data

resume.summary: Engineer-turned-MBA specializing in business analytics, strategy, and AI-enabled product development. Blends systems thinking from structural engineering with data-driven decision-making and product execution. Open to roles in product management, strategy/ops, and applied AI.
experience: Structural Engineer — Designed and managed water infrastructure projects with cross-functional coordination and rigorous calculation/QA workflows.
Graduate Projects — Led/assisted AI-driven product design, carbon credit pricing models, and digital transformation (sustainability focus).
education: MBA, NYU Stern — Business Analytics, Strategy, Tech Product Management (2023–present)
